commit.message:
texi2pod.pl: Force .pod file to not be a numbered list.

	* texi2pod.pl: Force .pod file to not be a numbered list.

From-SVN: r210889

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@
+2014-05-24  Uros Bizjak  <ubizjak@gmail.com>
+
+	* texi2pod.pl: Force .pod file to not be a numbered list.
+

 	* dg-extract-results.py (parse_run): Handle warnings that are printed
